title: The Big Suey: Meadowlarkers 52 "Daryl Morey Attacks The Gaps"
description:
Tom Haberstroh joins Kate and Amin for this episode of Meadowlarkers! After Kevin O'Connor's article in The Ringer, "Daryl Morey Changed the Game, but He Still Hasn't Beaten It," the crew dives into Morey's career path, unconventional methods, the way he has created a new lane in basketball and learned from others, and how much winning a title impacts the legacy of someone in an NBA front office.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
